title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, August 5, 2021
description: It’s the 87th birthday of poet, novelist, and environmentalist Wendell Berry. He believes that art is not the most important thing in life, and you must keep it in perspective.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the 87th birthday of poet, novelist, and environmentalist Wendell Berry. He believes that art is not the most important thing in life, and you must keep it in perspective.
